User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user within the application.

fullName.description: The full name of the user.

role.description: The role of the user (e.g., admin, backend, frontend).

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user was created.

Task.title: Task
Task.description: Represents a task within the application.

description.description: A detailed description of the task.

forTeam.description: The team the task is assigned to (e.g., backend, frontend).

assigneeId.description: Reference to User. (Relationship: User 1:N Task).  The ID of the user assigned to the task.

status.description: The current status of the task (e.g., backlog, in_progress, review, done).

priority.description: The priority of the task (e.g., low, medium, high).

due.description: The due date of the task.

tags.description: An array of tags associated with the task.

createdBy.description: Reference to User. (Relationship: User 1:N Task). The ID of the user who created the task.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the task was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the task was last updated.

commissionRate.description: Commission rate for the task, if applicable.

clientDetails.description: Details about the client for this task.

requirements.description: Specific requirements for the task (e.g., color codes, UX guidelines).

reviewerId.description: The ID of the user responsible for reviewing the task.

File.title: File
File.description: Represents a file uploaded for a task.

taskId.description: Reference to Task. (Relationship: Task 1:N File). The ID of the task the file is associated with.

uploadedBy.description: Reference to User. (Relationship: User 1:N File).  The ID of the user who uploaded the file.

size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

type.description: The MIME type of the file.

url.description: The URL of the file stored in Firebase Storage.

uploadedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the file was uploaded.

Attendance.title: Attendance
Attendance.description: Represents a single attendance record for a user.

clockIn.description: The timestamp when the user clocked in.

clockOut.description: The timestamp when the user clocked out.

Course.title: Course
Course.description: Represents a course assigned to a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user this course is assigned to.

link.description: A URL to the course material.

duration.description: The expected duration of the course (e.g., '2 hours', '3 weeks').

status.description: The current status of the course.

startedAt.description: Timestamp when the course was started.

completedAt.description: Timestamp when the course was completed.

definition.description: Stores user information, including role and creation timestamp.
Stores task details, including assignee, status, team, and timestamps.
Stores file metadata associated with a task.
